input.sentences: [female] and [male] were headed out to see a football game .
they both were against each other but did n't care who won .
[female] poses for pictures in pretend uniforms .
[male] poses for his favorite team as well in the fake uniform .
they sit down and watch an awesome game .
output.sentences: Males are often fascinated by sports, hence why this couple were headed to the game.
She didnt much care, but her boyfriend did.
They saw some team uniforms at the door that you could pretend to wear, and struck a couple poses.
It was the uniform of his favorite team, and he did some poses as well.
After this, they were able to sit and watch the game.
